name: Harmonica IT, Inc.
description: Developer of a dating application designed to match users with their partner on scientific grounds. The company's application provides a questionnaire designed by local experts in marriage therapy and the results is then processed by matching algorithm, that provides the users everyday with only 1 quality match and also works on an AI program that studies how much two people talk to each other and their linguistics and then analyses the result, enabling Egyptians to find and communicate with a better match than the average conventional methods in a pressure free, engaging environment.
one_liner: Developer of a dating application designed to match users with their partner on scientific grounds. The company's application provides a questionnaire designed by local experts in marriage therapy and the results is then processed by matching algorithm, that provides the users everyday with only 1 quality match and also works on an AI program that studies how much two people talk to each other and their linguistics and then analyses the result, enabling Egyptians to find and communicate with a better match than the average conventional methods in a pressure free, engaging environment.
